Key Match Events: Niclas Fullkrug scored his first Germany goal since joining West Ham in the summer
Jamal Musiala doubled Germany's lead as they broke from a Hungary corner, running through one on one from his own half to slot home
Florian Wirtz drilled in from 16 yards after getting the ball from Musiala
Aleksandar Pavlovic scored their fourth with a low shot, his first Germany goal
Kai Havertz scored a penalty to complete Julian Nagelsmann's side's comfortable win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany eased to victory over Hungary to start their Nations League campaign in style in Dusseldorf
The match was played at the Merkur Spiel-Arena in front of an attendance of 49,235
Others: Niclas Fullkrug put Germany ahead from Jamal Musiala's ball to cap off a fine passing move
Kai Havertz, who hit the underside of the crossbar in each half
